summary: PROBLEM WITH ABS LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON DASH AND ABS MODULATOR.  *MR  THE ABS LIGHT HAD COME ON.  THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THE MODULATOR COULD BE RESET BUT THERE WAS NO GUARANTEE THAT THE LIGHT WOULD NOT COME BACK ON.  WITHIN TWELVE MILES AFTER THE REPAIR, THE LIGHT HAD COME BACK ON.  *SCC   *JB
